body:
Are they allowed?
I know the rules perfectly well, so I don't need to be reminded, but they are a big deal, and show that you've finally "mastered" a certain gamemode.
Prestige 1-4 threads are pretty pointless, but are prestige 5 threads allowed?
body_tagged:
Are they allowed?
I know the rules perfectly well, so I don't need to be reminded, but they are a big deal, and show that you've finally "mastered" a certain gamemode.
Prestige 1-4 threads are pretty pointless, but are prestige 5 threads allowed?
title: Prestige 5 Threads?

replies.body: Well what are all these prestige celebration being locked? I understand the spam but can't they have a grace period in which people can acknowledge our player and their acheivements?
replies.body_tagged: Well what are all these prestige celebration being locked? I understand the spam but can't they have a grace period in which people can acknowledge our player and their acheivements?

replies.body: I think 1st and 5th prestiege should be fine and legal
replies.body_tagged: I think 1st and 5th prestiege should be fine and legal

replies.body:
1-4 Prestige threads aren't allowed because they really aren't considered that large of an achievement. 

Prestige 5 is a very large milestone; therefore, they are allowed.
